attributes.action: Amend the DCR Reg 12 schedule 1 para 65 Reg 1996 to allow men and women to share cabins when on opposite shifts while working on offshore installations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This regulation is impractical and unreasonable. Segregation by cabins makes no difference in comparison to segregation by shift. Women are being refused work and discriminated against due to the fact that this regulation dictates that women and men cannot share a cabin for any reason while working on offshore installations. Due to this women are suffering loss of earnings, experience and opportunities for promotion; this is an indirect discrimination against women.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Amend the DCR Reg 12 schedule 1 para 65 Reg 1996 to allow men and women to share cabins when on opposite shifts while working on offshore installations."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19399
